duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare, record, verify, and pay vendor invoices for goods and services in a timely manner.
Maintain, analyze, and reconcile accounts payable ledger accounts, financial statements, and reports.
Work closely with the Accounts Payable Manager to develop, direct, plan, and evaluate accounts payable policies and procedures.
Ensure adherence to external and internal controls and policies.
Develop, implement, and maintain procedures and policies for accounts payable functions to ensure adherence to company guidelines.
Reconcile monthly statements and verify vendor accounts.
Provide accounting assistance to project managers and operations staff and respond to financial questions/concerns to meet business needs.
